channel.title: CVE Feed for Jeff Starr -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jeff Starr -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-45603|2024-08-02T20:21:16.836Z -- jeff%20starr -- user%20submitted%20posts%20%E2%80%93%20enable%20users%20to%20submit%20posts%20from%20the%20front%20end
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in Jeff Starr User Submitted Posts – Enable Users to Submit Posts from the Front End.This issue affects User Submitted Posts – Enable Users to Submit Posts from the Front End: from n/a through 20230902.

item.title: CVE-2023-49743|2024-08-02T22:01:25.916Z -- jeff%20starr -- dashboard%20widgets%20suite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jeff Starr Dashboard Widgets Suite allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Dashboard Widgets Suite: from n/a through 3.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-26517|2024-08-02T11:53:53.772Z -- jeff%20starr -- dashboard%20widgets%20suite
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Jeff Starr Dashboard Widgets Suite plugin <= 3.2.1 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-7251|2024-03-26T08:40:39.209Z -- jeff%20starr -- user%20submitted%20posts
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jeff Starr User Submitted Posts allows Stored XSS.This issue affects User Submitted Posts: from n/a through 20230901.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jeff Starr User Submitted Posts allows Stored XSS.This issue affects User Submitted Posts: from n/a through 20230901.
